EmailTemplate.description: Warranty - How to request a warranty verification
EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - How to request a warranty verification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Please raise your warranty verification request by:
- Creating a Z116 task in the SAP notification
or
- Sending a new email from Outlook with the subject “Warranty Verification Request” to AerospaceWarranty@Honeywell.com and include below information: • Part Number • Serial Number • Aircraft Information (Type, S/N, Tail number) • Sales Order • Customer Name
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
